entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
